column4: Fast Attacks increase Strong Attack damage for $S$ seconds by $S$% for each piece of the set. Current bonus: $S$%.
The overall spell power of all Signs is increased by 5%.

If a sign is cast when he has full aderenaline, Geralt will enter a heightened state where he invulnerble and all of his abilities are greatly enhanced for 20 seconds. Cannot be used again afterwords for 50 seconds.

Each blow generates charges which increase sword damage by $S$%. Charges are lost over time or when receiving damage. A fully-charged sword always deals critical hit damage. Is effective against both humans and monsters.
